news_header: Trane Technologies plc reported a fourth-quarter earnings increase, surpassing estimates.
news_original_title: Trane Technologies Plc Q4 Profit Increases, Beats Estimates
news_text: Trane Technologies plc (TT) announced its fourth-quarter earnings, which rose to $607.70 million, or $2.67 per share, compared to $513.30 million, or $2.23 per share, from the previous year. Adjusted earnings were $592.90 million, or $2.61 per share, beating analysts' expectations of $2.54 per share. Revenue increased by 10.2% to $4.874 billion from $4.424 billion last year. The FY25 EPS guidance is between $12.70 and $12.90.
